name: CAMPAIGN_ASSET
description: Table containing information about campaign assets.

columns.name: email_asset_id
columns.description: Foreign key referencing EMAIL asset ID

columns.name: created_date
columns.description: Date when the campaign asset was created

columns.name: item_id
columns.description: Item ID associated with the campaign asset

columns.name: object_id
columns.description: Object ID associated with the campaign asset
